title: Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and flattering, with one noting it hits right below the knees. The gorgeous silver dress features vibrant colors without being too much, and one customer particularly appreciates the sparkle of the sequins. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some praising the fabric while others find it very thin, and customers disagree on the sizing, with some reporting it runs small. "...I was a hit with this dress! Everyone asked how I found it! Perfect fit and well constructed! I only wish I had taken a picture in it!" items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Party Dress
items.body: I was right between sizes so I ordered the larger one which was the right call as it was a perfect fit. Loved the sparkle of the sequins but the sequin one does not have pockets. Not a deal breaker for today but for other occasions it could have been. Got a lot of compliments though. I wore it with a crinoline so it puffed out and looked perfect. Read more
items.author: James Carter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: This dress is absolutely adorable. I am 5’4”, 125 lbs (and a bit “chesty”) and the medium fit perfectly. The skirt is full but the rest is fitted and the sash/bow gives it a great style. I ordered it for a wedding I am attending this weekend and can not wait to wear it. It is lined, made very well, and looks exactly as depicted in the picture. I was tossed up between this pattern and the blue one. I do not think you can go wrong with whichever pattern you choose. Read more
items.author: Linda

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun and cute
items.body: This dress is super cute. It isn't made very well, but for the price I don't expect it to be. It's mostly cotton and needs to be ironed after washing. I washed it cold gentle cycle and a hang dried it. I don't think it will last through normal washing and drying. It's really cute, it fit really well, and is really flattering. It's great at hiding my stomach, and shows off my shape. It hits right at the knee for me, but I'm tall. The fabric is printed only on the outside, which usually means it will fade quickly. Read more
items.author: Hillary H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress for the season
items.body: It’s so beautiful. I’m pregnant and fit me very well. Read more
items.author: Isabel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, comfy dress
items.body: This is a great, comfortable dress. The fabric is a nice cotton, with a bit of stretch. It's a good thickness and not at all see-through. It fit true to size. And the pockets are really good. I could fit my full-size phone, wall, and more the pockets. (My women friends want to say the pockets are big enough to replace a small purse.) They are a bit higher than I would like, but reasonable. I'm 5'10" (178 cm), so the pockets are probably at a better height for shorter folk. And it's super comfy. The first night I wore it, the AC broke and stayed up waiting for the house to cool to go to bed. Eventually I fell asleep in the dress! Finally, the dress is very flattering. When I went to the bar, a women I don't know stopped me to tell me I'm rocking the dress. :) Read more
items.author: A guy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lovely idea, disappointing execution
items.body: I want to love this piece but without a petty skirt its just blah (so grab one if you want the full effect). Quality was only okay, no lining, hard to wash out the wrinkles from shipping, zipper was okay, neckline was higher than expected. Wouldn't buy another, unfortunately. Read more
items.author: Chelsea Risley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits true to size
items.body: This dress is so cute! I ordered for a costume, but now plan to wear at work. I ordered a small, I typically buy small or extra small and it fits nicely. The material does not wrinkle easily and the tie is longer than I expected, but gives good room for the bow. Read more
items.author: Angie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars I love the dress!!
items.body: I felt pretty. It was very comfortable, except where my under arm part is fitted It was not comfortable. But the material felt great. It was easy to get the wrinkles out. I wish it was a different zipper though it’s hard to push up the zipper so the quality is iffy. My husband thought it was gonna break zipping up my . The pattern was very bright and pretty. Read more
items.author: nicole haislmaier

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-blush Pink, White Black Floral, A-burgundy, Pumpkin, Fuchsia, Black White Flower, White Lemon, Pink Rose, Porcelain, Red Flower, Red Plaid, 01champagne Sequins, 01silver Sequins, Mint Flower. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
